attributes.action: Baby P's mother set to be freed?
attributes.additional_details:
Tracey Connelly was jailed indefinitely with a minimum of 5 years in May 2009 for causing or allowing her son Peter's death.  The Parole Board, which assesses the dangerousness of criminals eligible for release, has refused to comment on whether the mother of Baby P could soon be freed.  She cannot be released for only serving 5 years.  She should be in there for life because her "major role" was allowing the abuse to occur.  Criminally negligent manslaughter.

http://news.uk.msn.com/uk/articles.aspx?cp-documentid=250753576
